Module mantil3.c482pa
Package mantil3.model

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
mantil3.model.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
Class for the entire Inventory of Products and Parts
Keeps running lists for allParts and allProducts
also has useful common methods for Parts/Products within the Inventory
See Also:

    • getFilteredParts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> getFilteredParts(String input)
      Returns a filtered allParts based on the String passed
      Part is passed to filteredParts list based on Name or ID match
      LOGICAL ERROR: does not return values if case doesn't match.
      FIXED: added toLowerCase method
      Parameters:
      input - String typed into field
      Returns:
      Observable list filteredParts

      Returns:
